goal.en: "The objective of this course is to help students obtain basic knowledge in customer relationship management (CRM). The course content contains five issues: CRM theory and development, CRM and data management, Impact on sales and marketing strategy, CRM evaluation and Ethic consideration of CRM. Both theoretical issues and practical issues of CRM are taken into accounts in the design of this course. In additions, cases are also included for the application knowledge and information details to be addressed for contemporary management."

content.en:
建立良好穩定的顧客關係是21世紀企業獲利的關鍵，如何運用資訊科技來了解客戶需求、提升顧客滿意度、維持良好顧客關係與制定顧客管理策略是企業經營重要的議題。本課程旨在
(a) 培養同學關於企業顧客關係建立、管理、分析、經營之能力。
(b) 運用國內外CRM個案作深入研討，以理論結合實務的方式加強學習效果。
